meta.content: Welcome to the Upland Unified School District website. At UUSD we challenge our students to achieve their greatest potential so they are well-prepared for life beyond high school. Please read more about us, and learn how we help students attain the education they need to be successful and move on to study at the colleges and universities of their choice. At UUSD we focus on every single student, every single day.

div.p: Proud to be one of the highest achieving school districts in the San Bernardino County, we at Upland Unified School District serve over 11,000 kindergarten through twelfth graders in our 14 public schools. Please read more about us and the leaders of our district who work to make Upland USD a great place for Upland students.

div.div: Upland Unified School District Coronavirus Closures

div.p: In coordination with public health agencies, the Governor’s Office, and schools across the region and state, the Upland Unified School District announced today that campus closures will continue through the end of the current academic year due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
